title: Star Wars: Knight Errant, Vol. 3: Escape
description: In order to discover the fate of her parents, Jedi Kerra Holt must descend deeper into enemy territory than she's ever gone - she must become a Sith! Joining a team hunting for a relic of extraordinary evil, Kerra hopes their search will reveal the truth about her missing parents - before it leads the Sith to a tool of ultimate destruction! But Kerra's desire to find her lost family is clouding her judgment. If the relic falls into Sith hands, the galaxy is doomed!
author: John Jackson Miller
